intro: Licania orbicularis, commonly known as the orbicular licania, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, round leaves that are typically bright green and glossy. It produces showy, pale pink to white flowers that bloom in clusters, attracting various pollinators. Licania orbicularis is often found in moist, shaded areas within tropical forests, where it thrives in the understory vegetation.
